entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -35.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 02:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -35.6°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -39.1°C
Wind: WNW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 9:17 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 61 in the morning and minus 54 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 9:17 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 57 in the evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 9:17 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
